testcase.name: Successful Logout
As a user, I want to see all products
As a user, I want to view more about the company
As a user, I want to log out
As a user, I want to clear the cart
View product listings on the Products page
Navigating to a product page by clicking the product image
Navigating to a product page by clicking the product name
Viewing a unique image for each product
